headline: Stocks to Watch Tuesday: AIG, Vistra, Microchip, Under Armour
summary: ↗️ Vistra (VST): The power-generation company plans to buy Cogentrix Energy in a roughly $4 billion deal that will include natural-gas generation facilities. Shares rallied as much as 5% Tuesday morning.

headline: Bluescope Steel receives $8.8bn takeover bid from SGH and Steel Dynamics
summary: BlueScope is reviewing the non-binding cash offer, which includes further due diligence.

headline: 4 Steel Producer Stocks In Focus as Industry Gains on Price Recovery
summary: The rebound in steel prices and firm demand in construction and automotive should help Steel Producers industry players MT, STLD, CMC and SID to gain.

headline: Stocks to Watch Tuesday: Nvidia, Steel Dynamics, Microchip
summary: ? Nvidia (NVDA): The semiconductor maker is rolling out faster artificial-intelligence chips sooner than expected. The company’s newest AI server systems, known as Vera Rubin, will go on sale in the second half of this year.

headline: Steel Dynamics, SGH Bid $8.8 Billion to Acquire BlueScope Steel
summary: Steel Dynamics  intensified efforts to buy the North Star steel mill in Ohio, partnering on an US$8.8 billion bid to acquire its Australian owner in the latest example of tariffs reshaping a once-struggling sector.  Indiana-based Steel Dynamics has made three unsuccessful bids for North Star and other assets owned by  BlueScope Steel  beginning in late 2024.  On Monday, Steel Dynamics said it teamed up with Australian conglomerate SGH last month to make a fourth attempt to buy the business.
